document.docAuthor: Yunakov, Nikolai, Nazarenko, Vitalij, Filimonov, Rostislav & Volovnik, Semyon
document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Boheman, C. H.
bibRefCitation.refString: Boheman, C. H. (1838) [new taxa]. In: Schoenherr, C. J., Genera et species curculionidum, cum synonymia hujus familiae. Species novae aut hactenus minus cognitae, descriptionibus a Dom. Leonardo Gyllenhal, C. H. Boheman, et entomologis aliis illustratae. Vol. 4 (2). Roret, Parisii and Fred. Fleischer, Lipsia, pp. 601 - 1124.

subSubSection.paragraph:

Biology. Xerothermic grasslands, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in V–VIII. On Scrophulariaceae :
Scrophularia nodosa ( Penecke 1928 )
;
Verbascum thapsus
( Penecke 1928 ; Gumovsky 1997);
V. nigrum
,
V. lychnitis
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1976 );
V. phlomoides ( Smreczyński 1976 )
.
